description.value:
Siogarithax, the Cruel Star, was once a Ravikan paladin in service to the Great Star Dragon. In death, she became a devil, but does not serve in the court of the Adversaries, instead keeping to her ancient alliance.

Edicts: Establish dominance, serve your betters unquestioningly, behave as an example to others.

Anathema: Relax excessively or give in to sloth, aid or grant mercy to Siogarithax's enemies, dishonor yourself or Siogarithax.

Areas of Concern: The Great Star Dragon, Ravika, knighthood.
